content: New Giveaway: Soccer ArenaThe rewards: $2550 in Soccer Arena NFT  Referral: YesRate:      Focus: 🥇 1 Epic Players - $1100🥈1 Super rare player - $250🥉1 Super rare player - $250 ; 4-8 Receive a 1 ( $160 ) standard pack each15 random participants (who complete all tasks without exception) will receive 1 ( $15 ) random players eachGiveaway Link: Giveaway Bot▫️Join our telegram channel and chat and write a positive message or ask a question about the project▫️Join advertising channel▫️Follow us on Twitter and Retweet This Tweet  and @Tag 3 Friends and HashTag #LegitCommunity #Soccer_Arena #Giveaway #NFT #DAO▫️Follow Ad page▫️Send Bot the Telegram username of the member who invited you ❗️ Example: @KonstantinTeamLC▫️Submit your Polygon (MATIC) wallet address in the Giveaway bot  ⚠️The list of winners will be tweeted with the hashtag #LegitCommunityWinners⚠️‼️ Join Soccer Arena Airdrop 👉🏻 Prize Pool $21,750 ‼️Note: Giveaway ends 2 June . Distribution of the reward 2 JuneAdditional Information: Welcome to Soccer Arena , the ultimate soccer manager game!Soccer Arena is a decentralized NFT soccer (a.k.a. football) game based on BlockChain technology from Polygon (MATIC) and BSC (Binance), where players can find the perfect mix between soccer and cryptocurrencies.Website | Telegram chat | Twetter | Discord | YouTubeDisclaimer: Please do your own research before joining to any giveaways project, also giveaway  is 100% free. Don't send any fee or penny for receiving giveaways tokens. Just join giveaways for free.
